balance: We had 1481031 USDC-CASH LP tokens, worth $1,499,731.
source: I am managing the hard-earned money of a larger group of people that are disheartened by the traditional finance system and want to keep their money safe in a decentralized system. As a believer in crypto and DeFi, I want to be the flag bearer and bring new people with me in this new decentralized world and against the traditional world. Unfortunately, these types of hacks have the opposite effect as people will start losing confidence in DeFi and will go back to the traditional system, which is definitely something all of us don't want. For these reasons, I really hope you will return the money to the people. We agree that it would be fair for you to keep 10% for your hard work uncovering the smart contract vulnerability.

5. We had 1481031 USDC-CASH LP tokens, worth $1,499,731.
6. I am managing the hard-earned money of a larger group of people that are disheartened by the traditional finance system and want to keep their money safe in a decentralized system. As a believer in crypto and DeFi, I want to be the flag bearer and bring new people with me in this new decentralized world and against the traditional world. Unfortunately, these types of hacks have the opposite effect as people will start losing confidence in DeFi and will go back to the traditional system, which is definitely something all of us don't want. For these reasons, I really hope you will return the money to the people. We agree that it would be fair for you to keep 10% for your hard work uncovering the smart contract vulnerability.
